subdisciplines.name: Military Strategy
subdisciplines.description: The study of military planning and execution in relation to overall strategic goals

subdisciplines.name: Naval History
subdisciplines.description: The study of naval warfare and the role of navies in the history of warfare

subdisciplines.name: Military Technology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the development and use of technology in warfare

subdisciplines.name: Military Intelligence
subdisciplines.description: The study of intelligence gathering, analysis, and use in military affairs
